title: Windows 10 GWX Killer
description:
Windows 10 GWX Killer - -nelly-
                         ===============================



Description:
============

This is a small installer i created to completely kill the pain in the ass Windows 10 update icon in your taskbar and it's associated pop-up.

2 clicks and it's gone forever :)

Instructions:
=============

1. Open - Run the installer as Administrator
2. Click on the "Kill GWX" TAB and follow the on-screen prompts.
3. Click on the "Re-Boot" TAB to re-boot your machine.

Job Done!

Tested on windows 7,8 and 8.1. Both architectures.
